Summary: Large, very bright, elongated, larger on one side then narrows.
divs: sighting detailsmom spotted it in the backyard night sky. clear sky, little to no clouds, full moon, center city location, no stars, big bright white object. odd. it seems to be stationary located a quarter up of the horizon. the full moon is behind me. it's sw of me. moon is rising in the se. i think it's a tv satellite. i took a non-digital photo. when i went back to re-photo w\ digital it had lowered & got hidden by building. there are only 2 blocks between my home & river so views of sw sky are good.
trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Reading
